info.title: idocs api document
info.description:
The notifyCapture API is used by Alipay to send the capture result to the merchant when the capture processing reaches a final state of success or failure.  

Structure

A message consists of a header and body. The following sections are focused on the body structure. For the header structure, see£º 

  • Request header
  • Response header


Note: Set the data type of each field (except array) as String. This means that you must use double quotation marks (" ") to enclose the field value. Examples:

  • If the data type of a field is Integer and its value is 20, set it as "20". 
  • If the data type of a field is Boolean and its value is true, set it as "true".
info.descriptionLake:
The notifyCapture API is used by Alipay to send the capture result to the merchant when the capture processing reaches a final state of success or failure.  

Structure

A message consists of a header and body. The following sections are focused on the body structure. For the header structure, see£º 

  • Request header
  • Response header


Note: Set the data type of each field (except array) as String. This means that you must use double quotation marks (" ") to enclose the field value. Examples:

  • If the data type of a field is Integer and its value is 20, set it as "20". 
  • If the data type of a field is Boolean and its value is true, set it as "true".

resultCode.description: The result code that indicates the detailed processing result.
resultCode.descriptionLake: The result code that indicates the detailed processing result.

resultStatus.description:
The capture status. Valid values are:

  • S: Indicates that the capture status is successful.
  • F: Indicates that the capture status is failed.
resultStatus.descriptionLake:
The capture status. Valid values are:

  • S: Indicates that the capture status is successful.
  • F: Indicates that the capture status is failed.

resultMessage.description: The result message that describes the result code in detail.
resultMessage.descriptionLake: The result message that describes the result code in detail.

result.description: Details about the payment capture result, such as capture status, result code, and result message.
result.descriptionLake: Details about the payment capture result, such as capture status, result code, and result message.

notifyType.description: The type of notification. The notification type of this API is CAPTURE_RESULT.
notifyType.descriptionLake: The type of notification. The notification type of this API is CAPTURE_RESULT.

captureRequestId.description: The unique ID that is assigned by the merchant to identify a capture request.
captureRequestId.descriptionLake: The unique ID that is assigned by the merchant to identify a capture request.
captureRequestId.x-idempotencyDescription: For capture requests that are initiated with the same value of captureRequestId and reach a final status (S or F), the same result is to be returned for the request.

paymentId.description: The unique ID that is assigned by Alipay to identify a payment.
paymentId.descriptionLake: The unique ID that is assigned by Alipay to identify a payment.

captureId.description: The unique ID assigned by Alipay to identify a capture.
captureId.descriptionLake: The unique ID assigned by Alipay to identify a capture.

currency.description: The 3-letter currency code that follows the ISO 4217 standard.
currency.descriptionLake: The 3-letter currency code that follows the ISO 4217 standard.

value.description:
The amount to charge as a positive integer in the smallest currency unit. (That is, 100 cents to charge $1.00, or 100 to charge JPY 100, a 0-decimal currency).

For details about the smallest currency unit, see Smallest unit of the currency.
value.descriptionLake:
The amount to charge as a positive integer in the smallest currency unit. (That is, 100 cents to charge $1.00, or 100 to charge JPY 100, a 0-decimal currency).

For details about the smallest currency unit, see Smallest unit of the currency.

captureAmount.description: The capture amount that the merchant requests to receive in the transaction currency.
captureAmount.descriptionLake: The capture amount that the merchant requests to receive in the transaction currency.

captureTime.description: The time when Alipay captures the payment.
captureTime.descriptionLake: The time when Alipay captures the payment.

acquirerReferenceNo.description: The unique ID assigned by the non-Alipay acquirer for the transaction.
acquirerReferenceNo.descriptionLake: The unique ID assigned by the non-Alipay acquirer for the transaction.

resultCode.description: Result code. The value is fixed as SUCCESS.
resultCode.descriptionLake: Result code. The value is fixed as SUCCESS.

resultStatus.description: Result status. The value is fixed as S, which means the notification is received successfully.
resultStatus.descriptionLake: Result status. The value is fixed as S, which means the notification is received successfully.

resultMessage.description: Result message that explains the result code. The value is fixed as success.
resultMessage.descriptionLake: Result message that explains the result code. The value is fixed as success.

result.description: A fixed value, which is sent to Alipay to acknowledge that the notification is received.
result.descriptionLake: A fixed value, which is sent to Alipay to acknowledge that the notification is received.

x-result.message: Success
x-result.action: The capture is successful, no further action is needed.
x-result.actionLake: The capture is successful, no further action is needed.

x-result.message: The access is denied.
x-result.action: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.
x-result.actionLake: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.

x-result.message: The payment authorization is canceled.
x-result.action: Use a new paymentRequestId to initiate a payment.
x-result.actionLake: Use a new paymentRequestId to initiate a payment.

x-result.message: The payment authorization is expired.
x-result.action: Use a new paymentRequestId to initiate a payment.
x-result.actionLake: Use a new paymentRequestId to initiate a payment.

x-result.message: The payment authorization is not found.
x-result.action: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.
x-result.actionLake: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.

x-result.message: The total capture amount exceeds the limit of the authorized payment amount.
x-result.action: Create a new capture request by using an amount less than or equal to the authorized payment amount, or contact Alipay Technical Support.
x-result.actionLake: Create a new capture request by using an amount less than or equal to the authorized payment amount, or contact Alipay Technical Support.

x-result.message: The capture is processing.
x-result.action: Wait for the notification from Alipay or inquiry about the capture result.
x-result.actionLake: Wait for the notification from Alipay or inquiry about the capture result.

x-result.message: The currency is not supported.
x-result.action: Check the currency used in the request, such as the capture currency. If the issue persists, contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.
x-result.actionLake: Check the currency used in the request, such as the capture currency. If the issue persists, contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.

x-result.message: The parameter values in the contract do not match those in the current transaction.
x-result.action: Check whether the parameter values in the contract match those in the current transaction. If the values match, contact Alipay Technical Support to troubleshoot the issue.
x-result.actionLake: Check whether the parameter values in the contract match those in the current transaction. If the values match, contact Alipay Technical Support to troubleshoot the issue.

x-result.message: The transaction does not support multiple captures.
x-result.action: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.
x-result.actionLake: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.

x-result.message: No payment methods are available.
x-result.action: Contact Antom Technical Support for detailed reasons.
x-result.actionLake: Contact Antom Technical Support for detailed reasons.

x-result.message: The transaction is canceled.
x-result.action: Use a new paymentRequestId to initiate a payment.
x-result.actionLake: Use a new paymentRequestId to initiate a payment.

x-result.message: The transaction status is abnormal. The payment cannot be captured.
x-result.action: Check the transaction status. If the values match, contact Alipay Technical Support to troubleshoot the issue.
x-result.actionLake: Check the transaction status. If the values match, contact Alipay Technical Support to troubleshoot the issue.

x-result.action: Check and verify whether the required request fields (including the header fields and body fields) of the current API are correctly passed and valid.
x-result.message: The required parameters are not passed, or illegal parameters exist. For example, a non-numeric input, an invalid date, or the length and type of the parameter are wrong.
x-result.actionLake: Check and verify whether the required request fields (including the header fields and body fields) of the current API are correctly passed and valid.

x-result.message: The number of captures exceeds the limit that is specified by the payment method.
x-result.action: Contact Alipay Technical Support to know the specific limit.
x-result.actionLake: Contact Alipay Technical Support to know the specific limit.

x-result.message: The capture failed.
x-result.action: Do not retry. Human intervention is usually needed. It is recommended that you contact Alipay Technical Support to troubleshoot the issue.
x-result.actionLake: Do not retry. Human intervention is usually needed. It is recommended that you contact Alipay Technical Support to troubleshoot the issue.

x-result.message: The submitted request exists, and the parameter values of this request are not consistent with those of the existing request.
x-result.action: Ensure all the fields in the requests are the same or use a new paymentRequestId to initiate a payment.
x-result.actionLake: Ensure all the fields in the requests are the same or use a new paymentRequestId to initiate a payment.

x-result.message: The request is rejected because of risk control.
x-result.action: Prompt the user that the request is rejected because of failed risk control.
x-result.actionLake: Prompt the user that the request is rejected because of failed risk control.

x-result.message: The capture amount exceeds the user payment limit.
x-result.action: Create a new capture by using an amount less than or equal to the user payment limit, or contact the user or the issuing bank.
x-result.actionLake: Create a new capture by using an amount less than or equal to the user payment limit, or contact the user or the issuing bank.

x-result.message: The user's balance is insufficient for the capture.
x-result.action: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.
x-result.actionLake: Contact Alipay Technical Support for detailed reasons.

x-result.message: The user's account does not exist on the payment method side.
x-result.action: Contact the user or the issuing bank.
x-result.actionLake: Contact the user or the issuing bank.

x-result.message: The user's account status is abnormal on the payment method side.
x-result.action: Contact Alipay Technical Support to know the specific reasons.
x-result.actionLake: Contact Alipay Technical Support to know the specific reasons.

x-result.message: The API call has failed, which is caused by unknown reasons.
x-result.action: Call the interface again to resolve the issue. If the problem persists, contact Alipay Technical Support.
x-result.actionLake: Call the interface again to resolve the issue. If the problem persists, contact Alipay Technical Support.
